ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: yes, it is useful for applied economists. note it doesn't teach you how to implement techniques, instead concentrates on the theory that is useful to applied economists.
A very practical course to learn how to use econometrics models in your own research.
I would recommend the course to other students but warn them to prepare well for class because classes are very confusing at times

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: If I want to do reduced form modeling in my research it would help a lot!
I think this course did a good job bridging the gap between econometric theory and practice. It helped me develop a better intuition of how theory and data are linked.
